trans-unit.source: Provides core services of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)] to manage and display user annotations.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce servizi di base del [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)] per gestire e visualizzare le annotazioni dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> class for use with a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> classe per l'uso con un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The document reading control associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo associato alla lettura del documento di <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> class for use with a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> classe per l'uso con un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The document viewing control associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo associato con la visualizzazione di documenti di <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: viewer is .
trans-unit.target: vieweris .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> class for use with a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> classe per l'uso con un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be used with <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived controls: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore può essere utilizzato con <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>controlli derivati:- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer></xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>

trans-unit.source: The document viewing control associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo associato con la visualizzazione di documenti di <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: viewer is .
trans-unit.target: vieweris .

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to clear highlight annotations from the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il comando per cancellare evidenziare annotazioni dalla selezione corrente.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to create a highlight annotation on the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il comando per creare un'annotazione dell'evidenziazione sulla selezione corrente.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to create an ink-note annotation on the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il comando per creare un'annotazione di note input penna sulla selezione corrente.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to create a text-note annotation on the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il comando per creare una testo di annotazione per la selezione corrente.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to delete all ink-note, text-note, and highlight annotations in the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il comando per eliminare tutte le note input penna, note di testo ed evidenziazione annotazioni nella selezione corrente.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to delete all ink-note and text-note annotations in the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il comando per eliminare tutte le annotazioni note input penna e note di testo nella selezione corrente.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Disables annotations processing and hides all visible annotations.
trans-unit.target: Disabilita l'elaborazione delle annotazioni e nasconde tutte le annotazioni visibili.

trans-unit.source: When Disable is called all annotations become hidden.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene chiamato disabilita tutte le annotazioni vengono nascoste.

trans-unit.source: Enables the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> for use with a given <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> and displays all visible annotations.
trans-unit.target: Consente di <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> per l'utilizzo con un determinato <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"> </xref> e consente di visualizzare tutte le annotazioni visibili.

trans-unit.source: When Enable is called all annotations in the viewer control window are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene chiamato Abilita tutte le annotazioni nella finestra di controllo del visualizzatore vengono visualizzate.

trans-unit.source: (The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.)
trans-unit.target: (Il controllo visualizzatore associato al servizio di annotazione è specificato nel parametro per il <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>costruttore.)</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The annotation store to use for reading, writing, and displaying annotations.
trans-unit.target: L'archivio di annotazione da utilizzare per la lettura, scrittura e la visualizzazione delle annotazioni.

trans-unit.source: annotationStore is .
trans-unit.target: annotationStoreis .

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> associated with a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> associato all'oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> method can be used to return the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associated with the following document viewing controls: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived subclasses - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A>metodo può essere utilizzato per restituire il <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>associato con il seguente documento controlli di visualizzazione:- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>sottoclassi - derivate <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>il controllo visualizzatore associato al servizio di annotazione è specificato nel parametro per il <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>costruttore.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A>

trans-unit.source: The document reader control to return the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> instance for.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo Visualizzatore di documento per restituire il <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> istanza per.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> associated with the given document reader control; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the specified document reader has no <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> associato al controllo di lettura del documento specificato; o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se il lettore del documento specificato non ha alcun <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> associated with a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> associato all'oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> method can be used to return the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associated with the following document viewing controls: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived subclasses - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A>metodo può essere utilizzato per restituire il <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>associato con il seguente documento controlli di visualizzazione:- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>sottoclassi - derivate <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>il controllo visualizzatore associato al servizio di annotazione è specificato nel parametro per il <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>costruttore.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A>

trans-unit.source: The document viewer control to return the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> instance for.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo Visualizzatore di documenti per restituire il <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> istanza per.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> associated with the given document viewer control; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the specified viewer control has no <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> associato al controllo Visualizzatore di documenti specificato; o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se il controllo visualizzatore specificato non ha alcun <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: viewer is .
trans-unit.target: vieweris .

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> instance associated with a specified document viewing control.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> istanza associata a un visualizzazione del controllo documento specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> method can be used to return the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associated with the following document viewing controls: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived subclasses - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A>metodo può essere utilizzato per restituire il <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>associato con il seguente documento controlli di visualizzazione:- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>sottoclassi - derivate <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>il controllo visualizzatore associato al servizio di annotazione è specificato nel parametro per il <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>costruttore.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A>

trans-unit.source: The document viewing control to return the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> instance for.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo per restituire la visualizzazione di documenti di <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> istanza per.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> associated with the given document viewing control; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the specified document viewing control has no <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> associato alla visualizzazione del controllo; il documento specificato o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se non ha alcun controllo di visualizzazione del documento specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: viewer is .
trans-unit.target: vieweris .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> è abilitata.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> è abilitato; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> used by this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"> </xref> usate da questo <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> used by the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> is specified as a parameter in the service's <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>utilizzato dal <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>è specificato come parametro del servizio <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> used by this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> used by this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
